title: With all the higher speeds now being offered by local cable companies in Wilmington for the internet, does ATT plan to increase their speeds for their DSL service locally?  (Time Warner and Charter now offer speeds up to 20mbps while the local DSL service from ATT never reaches 6mbps.)
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
